Detailed Description

Member Function Documentation

Filesystem::filesize_readable ( $  file,
$  retstring = null 
) [static]

Returns a human readable representation of the size of file.

This method formats the filesize according to a hardcoded format string, but you can also provide a custom format string.

Parameters:
file The name of the file whose size we want to show.
retstring An optional alternative format string.
